title: Always You
description:
Jack and Josie have been friends since childhood, but now things have changed. It seems as though fate would see them end up as more than friends, but nothing, not even long-time love, comes without complications. Yet it’s the troubles that make the glory so much sweeter, and Jack and Josie learn nothing can stand in their way. Not when the only person they’ve ever really loved has been each other.Previously available only in electronic format, this steamy trilogy of erotic romance has now been combined—due to popular demand—for a paperback edition! Included are...
Playing The Game

Opening The Door

White Wedding
author: Megan Hart
